column4: hello i installed xubuntu on my laptop and im in need to configure my graphics card but i do not know what it is or how to figure out what graphics card i have
everything graphics oriented runs so choppy and crazy lol im gettin tired of it

hello and thanks for the help in advance i installed xubuntu on my laptop and all the graphics are choppy to fix this i am sure i need to do something with my graphics card which in turn i need to know what kind of graphics card i have in this beast any help on how to figure that out would be great
does lspci give you any clues?
